robo4earth:
Robo4earth makecode extension
to move the R4E robot and play melodies
robo4earth.changeMotorboard:
change motor pin settings for different Motor extension board. 
The default board is the motor extension module by waveshare.
robo4earth.changeMotorboard|param|board: choose the motorboard extension board on your R4e Robo4earth
robo4earth.driveBackward: robo4earth drives backward with given speed
robo4earth.driveForward: robo4earth drives forward with given speed
robo4earth.drive|param|direction: choose between forward, backward, left and driveRight
robo4earth.drive|param|seconds: tell the robot how long it should drive in seconds
robo4earth.drive|param|speed: the speed of the robot from [0-16], optional argument
robo4earth.playMelody|param|melody: choose the melody you want the robot to play
robo4earth.turnLeft: robo4earth turns left with given speed
robo4earth.turnMotor: move single motor forward or backward with given speed
robo4earth.turnRight: robo4earth turns right with given speed
